definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
thick paste of fermented soybean/marinated in soy paste/paste/jam

sentences.english: One easy example here would be Skippy peanut butter.
sentences.chinese: 一個很簡單的例子是Skippy花生醬。

sentences.english: Here . Here . Look. Put in this peanut butter.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，那用這個，把這個花生醬倒進去。

sentences.english: You are much slower than the turtles that flee back and forth in the peanut butter.
sentences.chinese: 你比在花生醬中一羣東逃西竄的烏龜還要慢。

sentences.english: For example, add peanut butter to your toast.
sentences.chinese: 例如，在吐司中加入花生醬。

sentences.english: Children tucked into biscuits and Nutella.
sentences.chinese: 孩子塞進餅乾和花生醬。

sentences.english: With the illnesses involving peanut butter, an initial suspect was chicken.
sentences.chinese: 在花生醬污染事件初期，雞是最初的懷疑對象。

sentences.english: In a small saucepan over low heat, melt peanut butter and butter and dissolve sugar.
sentences.chinese: 在一個小鍋裏低溫溶化花生醬和黃油。

sentences.english: Youareslower than a herd of turtles stampeding through peanut butter.
sentences.chinese: 你的速度比一羣在花生醬上亂竄的烏龜還慢。

sentences.english: You are show than a herd of turtles stampeding through peanut butter.
sentences.chinese: 你比一羣在花生醬中東逃西竄的烏龜還要慢。

sentences.english: More than 390 products containing peanut butter or peanut paste have been recalled.
sentences.chinese: 390多種被污染的花生醬和花生糊產品被召回。

sentences.english: Voice and the web go hand in hand together like peanut butter and jelly.
sentences.chinese: 語音和網絡的密切關係就好比是花生醬和果凍。

sentences.english: “Why is organic peanut butter better than Jif? ” said Ms.
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼有機花生醬會比普通的要好呢？
我朋友非常喜歡喫花生醬。

sentences.english: Opt for all-natural peanut butter to steer clear of added sugar and hydrogenated oils.
sentences.chinese: 選擇全天然花生醬，遠離添加糖和氫化油。

sentences.english: Did he wolf down that peanut butter cookie like the cookie monster was coming?
sentences.chinese: 他有沒有像餅乾怪獸一樣把花生醬曲奇一掃而光？

sentences.english: The dressing is a peanut-based sweet sauce that will leave you hungering for more.
sentences.chinese: 該花生醬是基於甜麪醬，將讓你更多的渴求。

definition: katsuobushi or dried bonito flakes (paper-thin shavings of preserved skipjack tuna)
minced meat sauce/(fig.) mincemeat/a person cut to pieces
lit. just the right flavor/just right/just the thing/excellent
